entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
